languages.text: {n}Капеллан обращает взгляд к вам и слегка кивает.{/n} "Я не имел в виду {mf|господина|госпожу} Фиделио — {mf|его|ее} Денз, по крайней мере, сам хотел увидеть на своих похоронах. Но остальные? Я знаю каждого из вас и очень удивлюсь, если кто тут подлинно скорбит".

{n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't referring to {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be astonished to discover anyone here who truly mourns this loss."
languages.original_text: {n}Капеллан обращает взгляд к вам и слегка кивает.{/n} "Я не имел в виду {mf|господина|госпожу} Фиделио — {mf|его|ее} Денз, по крайней мере, сам хотел увидеть на своих похоронах. Но остальные? Я знаю каждого из вас и очень удивлюсь, если кто тут подлинно скорбит".

traits.locale_text: {n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't talking about {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be greatly surprised to find out that anyone here is genuinely in mourning."

{n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't talking about {mf|Master|Madam} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be greatly surprised to find out that anyone here is genuinely in mourning."

{n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't referring to {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be astonished to discover anyone here who truly mourns this loss."

{n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't referring to {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be astonished to discover anyone here who truly mourns this loss."

{n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't referring to {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be astonished to discover anyone here who truly mourns this loss."

languages.text: {n}牧师看了看你，微微点了点头。{/n}“我并没有指菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}，至少丹兹本人肯定很希望能在他的葬礼上见到{mf|他|她}。至于剩下的人？你们每个人我都了如指掌。如果你们有谁真的在哀悼丹兹的离世，我恐怕都要惊掉下巴了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't referring to {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be astonished to discover anyone here who truly mourns this loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师看了看你，微微点了点头。{/n}“我并没有指菲迪奥{mf|大师|女士}，至少丹兹本人肯定很希望能在他的葬礼上见到{mf|他|她}。至于剩下的人？你们每个人我都了如指掌。如果你们有谁真的在哀悼丹兹的离世，我恐怕都要惊掉下巴了。”

languages.text: {n}Capellán te mira y asiente ligeramente.{/n} «No me refería a{mf|l maestro|la maestra} Fidelio; al menos el propio Denz quería que atendiera a su funeral. Pero ¿el resto? Os conozco a todos y me sorprendería saber que siquiera uno de vosotros lamenta su pérdida».
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't referring to {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be astonished to discover anyone here who truly mourns this loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}Capellán te mira y asiente ligeramente.{/n} «No me refería a{mf|l maestro|la maestra} Fidelio; al menos el propio Denz quería que atendiera a su funeral. Pero ¿el resto? Os conozco a todos y me sorprendería saber que siquiera uno de vosotros lamenta su pérdida».

languages.text: {n}教戒官はこちらを見て、軽くうなずいた。{/n}「{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオのことではありません。少なくとも、デンツ自身は{mf|彼|彼女}は彼の葬式に出席することを望んでいました。だが、他はどうだ？私はお前たちを一人ひとり知っていますが、この喪失を本当に嘆いている者がいるとは思えません」
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't referring to {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be astonished to discover anyone here who truly mourns this loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}教戒官はこちらを見て、軽くうなずいた。{/n}「{mf|マスター|ミストレス}・フィデリオのことではありません。少なくとも、デンツ自身は{mf|彼|彼女}は彼の葬式に出席することを望んでいました。だが、他はどうだ？私はお前たちを一人ひとり知っていますが、この喪失を本当に嘆いている者がいるとは思えません」

languages.text: {n}Ordenspriester sieht dich an und nickt dir zu.{/n} "{mf|Herrn|Herrin} Fidelio meine ich damit nicht – {mf|ihn|sie} wollte Denz selbst bei seiner Bestattung sehen. Aber der Rest? Ich kenne Euch alle und wäre erstaunt, wenn irgendeiner hier diesen Verlust tatsächlich betrauert."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't referring to {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be astonished to discover anyone here who truly mourns this loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ordenspriester sieht dich an und nickt dir zu.{/n} "{mf|Herrn|Herrin} Fidelio meine ich damit nicht – {mf|ihn|sie} wollte Denz selbst bei seiner Bestattung sehen. Aber der Rest? Ich kenne Euch alle und wäre erstaunt, wenn irgendeiner hier diesen Verlust tatsächlich betrauert."

languages.text: {n}Chapelain se tourne vers vous et vous adresse un léger signe de tête.{/n} « Cela exclut bien évidemment {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio. Denz lui-même espérait qu'{mf|il|elle} assisterait à ses funérailles. Mais vous autres ? Je vous connais tous, et je serais bien surpris qu'un seul d'entre vous soit sincèrement affecté par son décès. »
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't referring to {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be astonished to discover anyone here who truly mourns this loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}Chapelain se tourne vers vous et vous adresse un léger signe de tête.{/n} « Cela exclut bien évidemment {mf|maître|maîtresse} Fidélio. Denz lui-même espérait qu'{mf|il|elle} assisterait à ses funérailles. Mais vous autres ? Je vous connais tous, et je serais bien surpris qu'un seul d'entre vous soit sincèrement affecté par son décès. »

languages.text: {n}Papaz sana bakıp hafifçe başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bu sözlerim Fidelio {mf|Bey|Hanım} için değil elbette. Denz, kendisini cenazesinde görmek isterdi. Ya diğerleriniz? Hepinizin ciğerini biliyorum ciğerini! Aranızda Denz'in bu dünyadan göçüp gittiğine içtenlikle üzülen biri olduğuna hayatta inanmam."
languages.original_text: {n}Chaplain looks at you and gives a slight nod.{/n} "I wasn't referring to {mf|Master|Mistress} Fidelio — at least Denz himself wanted to see {mf|him|her} at his funeral. But the rest? I know every one of you, and I would be astonished to discover anyone here who truly mourns this loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}Papaz sana bakıyor ve hafifçe başını sallıyor.{/n} "Bu sözlerim {mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi} Fidelio için geçerli değil elbette. En azından Denz, {mf|onu|onu} cenazesinde görmek istemişti. Peki geri kalanlarınız? Hepinizi çok iyi tanıyorum ve aranızda Denz'in bu dünyadan göçüp gittiğine içtenlikle üzülen biri olduğuna görsem de inanmam."
